summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons memorandum from the Federal Correctional Complex in New York, NY, regarding a change to a purchase order for optical fiber backbone cabling equipment. It references technical design guidelines and lists specific line items to be changed, including Belden UTP cable.

events.title: Purchase Order Change Memorandum Issued
events.description: A memorandum is issued from the Federal Correctional Complex in New York, NY, documenting a change to a purchase order for communications optical fiber backbone cabling equipment.

locations: Federal Correctional Complex, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a Federal Bureau of Prisons memorandum regarding a purchase order change for communications cabling.
It is dated June 9, 2011, and originates from the Federal Correctional Complex at 150 Park Row, New York, NY.
The change involves optical fiber backbone cabling equipment, including a 12-fiber ST connector panel and Belden 2 Feet UTP Cable.
The memorandum references FBOP Technical Design Guidelines with an issue date of September 5, 2011.
No individuals are named in this document; it is purely an administrative procurement record.
